name: Meteor Shower (itch) (Upside Down)
description:
This game is made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme 'Out Of Control' and it was made in 2 days.

In this game you'll play as a spaceship to save earth from the meteor shower before it is too late and things get out of control. The game gets harder as you play so you have to pick up the upgrades and destroy the meteors before they reach the earth.

if you like the game you can check out my other games on my itch.io page.
